forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
